snippet: A police officer in Punjab Province hacked a man to death apparently over remarks considered to be blasphemous, the police said Thursday, just two days after a Christian couple was lynched over accusations of blasphemy in the same province.
abstract: Pakistani police officer in Punjab Province hacks a man to death apparently over remarks considered to be blasphemous, just two days after a Christian couple were killed over accusations of blasphemy in the same province.
lead_paragraph: A police officer in Punjab Province hacked a man to death apparently over remarks considered to be blasphemous, the police said Thursday, just two days after a Christian couple was lynched over accusations of blasphemy in the same province.

headline.main: Pakistan: Officer Kills Suspect Accused of Blasphemy, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Officer Kills Suspect Accused of Blasphemy, Police Say
